external_references.description: Counter Threat Unit Research Team. (2017, June 27). BRONZE UNION Cyberespionage Persists Despite Disclosures. Retrieved July 13, 2017.

description: [Threat Group-3390](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0027) has used appcmd.exe to disable logging on a victim server.(Citation: SecureWorks BRONZE UNION June 2017)
